reviewText: Yes,U can touch these great M.C. Hammer videos for a small cost. This collection surpasses previous VHS releases,one of them being the 1990 release HAMMER TIME!(released along with the PLEASE HAMMER DON'T HURT 'EM cassette,CD and limited edition LP). Hammer,born Stanley Kirk Burrell,delights his fans with videos of hits like U CAN'T TOUCH THIS,HAVE YOU SEEN HER,PRAY,TURN THIS MUTHA OUT,THIS IS THE WAY WE ROLL,ADDAMS GROOVE and TOO LEGIT TO QUIT. Hammer,like Little Richard Penniman,quit show business for the ministry. In Penniman's case,he returned to show business. Possibly,Hammer will do the same in the future. So pop this DVD into your player and get down and funky because it's Hammer Time!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I was a fan of McHammer in the early 90s....this is full of the great videos and music.  If you were a fan, you will love this
summary: If you loved McHammer...you'll love this!!!

reviewText: This is the ultimate collection of Hammer videos I have ever seen.  It is worth buying just for the video of PRAY, the most intellegent Rap song ever made.

reviewText: Hammer rocks, raps, dances, moves and energizes all...this brought back so many great memories and got me off of my backside and onto my feet!
summary: The greatest dance video music DVD out there

reviewText: Oh my gosh, this DVD is so cool, and fun to wake up with in the morning. It will surly get you going in a good mood. If Hammer did concerts again, I would go...big time. Whoa, this guy can dance!
summary: Please Mr. Hammer, come back to work!
